alert.note: Alert for Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 25 at 2:31AM PDT until March 29 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 1 to 3 feet possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County and Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County, including portions of Interstate 5 north of Redding. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels 2500 to 3500 feet, locally down to 2000 feet Tuesday and Wednesday mornings. Heaviest snow amounts above 3500 feet.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
